# Copilot Custom Agents

This repository contains custom GitHub Copilot agents in `.github/agents/`.

## Available Agents

To use these agents in GitHub Copilot (VS Code/GitHub.com), reference them with:
- `@java-review-agent` - Java code review with RAG reporting
- `@kotlin-review-agent` - Kotlin code review with RAG reporting
- `@swift-review-agent` - Swift code review with RAG reporting
- `@python-review-agent` - Python code review with RAG reporting
- `@terraform-generator` - Generate Terraform infrastructure code
- `@terraform-reviewer` - Review Terraform code
- `@workflow-generator-agent` - Generate GitHub Actions workflows
- `@workflows-review-agent` - Review GitHub Actions workflows
- `@test-generation-agent` - Generate unit and integration tests
- `@test-review-agent` - Review test code and coverage
- `@document-agent` - Review and update project documentation
- `@openapi-agent` - Generate OpenAPI specifications
- `@accessibility-auditor` - Audit accessibility compliance
- `@java-pair-programmer` - Pair programming for Java development

## Note
These agents are designed for GitHub Copilot in IDEs and GitHub.com, not the CLI tool.
